summary: Two girls on the run get lost in the French countryside, and wind up in a haunted chateau occupied by an ailing vampire and his servants.
cast: Marie-Pierre Castel|Mireille Dargent|Philippe Gasté|Dominique|Louise Dhour|Michel Delesalle|Antoine Mosin|Olivier François|Dominique Toussaint|Agnes Jacquet|Anne-Rose Kurra|Agnès Petit|Paul Bisciglia|Jean-Noël Delamarre
title: Requiem por un vampiro
